LocaleLayout.title: IELTS MASTER -ENGONOW
LocaleLayout.description: Your smart and creative solution for conquering the IELTS exam! With expertly designed resources, interactive practice tests, and personalized feedback, we empower you to reach your desired score.

home.introduction: Unlock your potential with IELTS MASTER, your comprehensive guide to conquering the IELTS exam. Our expert-designed materials, interactive exercises, and personalized feedback will empower you to achieve your desired score.
home.daily_practice: Enhance Your IELTS Skills with Free Online Tests
home.can_take: Experience IELTS preparation anytime, anywhere with study.engonow.com. Access free IELTS practice questions and full mock tests across all four skills: Listening, Speaking, Reading, and Writing. Detailed answers are provided to track your progress and boost your performance. Start your IELTS journey with us today and achieve your desired score!
home.hallofFame: Hall of Fame Ielts Master - Engonow

ielts_sections.reading_des: Sharpen your IELTS Reading skills with real exam formats inspired by the iconic Cambridge IELTS series
ielts_sections.listening_des: Master your IELTS Listening with high-quality audio tracks, instant results and in-depth explanations.
ielts_sections.writing_des: Improve your IELTS Writing skills with comprehensive feedback from Engonow's expert team.
ielts_sections.speaking_des: Enhance your IELTS Speaking and language reflexes through actual test questions.

home.Personalized_Recommendations: Receive customized recommendations for further improvement based on your specific performance. These recommendations provide actionable strategies, resources, and practice materials to help you achieve your desired outcomes.
home.detailed_feedback: Get immediate feedback after each practice test, providing a clear understanding of your performance and areas for improvement. This detailed analysis helps you identify your strengths and weaknesses, empowering you to focus your efforts for maximum results.
home.performance_breakdown: Analyze your performance in each section of the practice test, gaining insights into your strengths and weaknesses across different skills. This detailed breakdown allows you to pinpoint areas where you need to focus your efforts for greater success.
home.not_login: Please log in for the best experience!

footer.ielts: The Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology (HCMUT). Polytechnic of Vietnam National University, Ho Chi Minh City is a research university in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. HCMUT is a member of Vietnam National University, Ho Chi Minh City. It focuses on high technology and engineering. It is one of the officially key universities in Vietnam.
